titleStmt.title: George M. Thomas et al. to Thomas E. Bramlette
CWG6273

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, Thomas E. Bramlette: Governor's official correspondence file, petitions for pardons, remissions, and respites 1863-1867

body.p:
To His Excellency The Govenor of the State of Kentucky
Sir:

We the undersigned petitioners would pray you would remit a fine imposed on Henry Wall for trading without License in Ohio county Ky -- you will see from the enclosed cirtificate that Mr Wall thought he was licensed, and knowing Mr Wall as we do, we don't believe he ever intended to violate any law.

D Sandefur
T. J. Cochran
J C B Ramsey
James A Porter
Richard S. Taylor
Jas H Leach
Geo M Thomas
B sandefur
W S Keown
N L. Keown
Jno H. Keown
B. T. Albin
Jno Baize Senr
Henry Baize
Mathias Baize
Wm Baize
Charles Baize
Abednego Baize
Joseph S Bayze
James B Allin
Thomas B Shults
T. P. Paxton
R Q Daniel
Thos, N, Gillstrap
Hedgman Hampton
P H Brown
T. R. Beesley
Luther Rogers
H P Rogers
R K Paxton
B A Ezell

Ohio Cir Ct
vs
Henry Wall
$30 --
